AzureAd.ClientSecret: Client secret from app-registration. Check user secrets/azure portal.

ConnectionStrings.MiskCvDbConnString: Connection string for Azure SQL database. Stored in usersecrets
ConnectionStrings.MiskCvDbTEMPConnString: Connection string for temporary development SQL database. Stored in user secrets
ConnectionStrings.RedisMiskConnString: Connection string for Development Redis Cache. Stored in user secrets
ConnectionStrings.RedisAzureConnString: Connection string for Azure Redis Cache. Stored in user secrets
